quote: Although I'm sure there are plenty of tall, gorgeous, life-of-the-party guys who are also true to their wives, I happen to believe that a disproportionate number of them are cheaters.
quote_letters: ALTHOUGH IM SURE THERE ARE PLENTY OF TALL GORGEOUS LIFE-OF-THE-PARTY GUYS WHO ARE ALSO TRUE TO THEIR WIVES I HAPPEN TO BELIEVE THAT A DISPROPORTIONATE NUMBER OF THEM ARE CHEATERS
